text: Sleeping with the Enemy is a 1991 American psychological thriller movie. It is based on the novel of the same name. It stars Julia Roberts as Laura Burney, a victim of domestic violence. She moves from Cape Cod, Massachusetts to Cedar Falls, Iowa to escape her violent, controlling husband. This movie was released during February of 1991. == Other websites == * Category:1991 crime drama movies Category:1991 thriller movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American psychological movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Movies set in Iowa Category:Movies about domestic violence Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:Movies directed by Joseph Ruben Category:Movies about stalking
title: Sleeping with the Enemy
